data.text: @Average_Homeboy My stake still doesn’t allow ball in our stake in Utah

@ipitythefoos @Average_Homeboy It's because it is photoshopped. We all know that teenagers playing basketball in a cultural hall was instant death by Covid. That photo is dangerous misinformation.  I mean, they aren't even wearing masks!!!
@Dallas1Tyler @Average_Homeboy Yeah it was rare before Covid. Might be extinct now
@Dallas1Tyler @Average_Homeboy Me. Not sure what came of it. But these days they hand them out at stake ball. (Just hope you are in the early game…)
@Dallas1Tyler @Average_Homeboy Looks like someone brought a bag of jerseys for pickup ball. So dudes had to bring their own shirts
@BleedBlueJeremy It was shut down for all of covid, I’m just so happy it’s back hopefully you guys will be playing soon

@Average_Homeboy Oh whoa! That's awesome! I think our Stake used COVID to get rid of organized church ball completely, haven't heard a word if it's ever coming back. I miss it tons even if I shoot like Westbrook.
@BleedBlueJeremy We’re playing church ball, schedule and everything, our stake president is pushing for stuff like this
@Average_Homeboy Wait you guys have a ref for pick up ball? https://t.co/g3h1k5UMMX
